Description: Join our team as a Senior GPU Performance Engineer focusing on CUDA. Transforming proof systems for a decentralized future, you will optimize GPU-based solutions for ZKP applications. Shape modern cryptography by enhancing ZKP capabilities through GPU acceleration. Key responsibilities include developing algorithms, identifying bottlenecks, and mentoring junior engineers. Qualifications required are a related Bachelor's degree with 2+ years of GPU computing experience, proficiency in CUDA, and strong problem-solving skills. Knowledge of ZKP and blockchain tech is beneficial. Enjoy competitive salary, equity, and remote work with global experts. Don't miss the chance to immerse yourself in cutting-edge technology and continuous growth opportunities!
Essential Skills: 1. Proficiency in GPU programming languages such as CUDA., 2. Strong understanding of computer architecture, memory systems, and parallel algorithms., 3. Experience in GPU computing with a focus on performance optimization and parallel programming., 4. Experience with profiling and debugging

Description: As a Security Analyst at ReliaQuest, you'll investigate and defend against cyber threats in large enterprise environments using cutting-edge technologies. You'll analyze security data, research trends, provide incident response support, and interpret results from security technologies like SIEM and IDS/IPS. Ideal candidates have a related degree, 1-3 years of experience, knowledge of security methodologies and tools, TCP/IP protocols, and strong communication skills. This role offers extensive training, career growth opportunities, and the chance to work in a dynamic, customer-focused environment. If you're energetic, adaptable, and eager to build a career in IT security, we want you on our team.

Job Title: Armed Security Officer | Metro One LPSG
Level: Job takes place at physical work location.
Description: Metro One is seeking Armed Security Officers to join our team of trained professionals. As an Armed Security Officer, you will provide a safe and secure environment for our clients by conducting security patrols and assisting customers. Benefits include health insurance, opportunities for advancement, company-paid uniforms, and extensive training. Qualified candidates must be active or retired Law Enforcement Officers, have a flexible schedule, and be able to work weekends or stand for long periods. Strong interpersonal skills and professionalism are essential. If you meet these requirements and are ready to contribute to our team, apply now to be part of our diverse and growing organization.
Essential Skills: - Must be an active or retired Law Enforcement Officer, - Must have a flexible schedule, - Must be able to work standing post for 8-hour shifts or longer, - Ability to interact with the public in a professional manner, - Strong interpersonal skills
